name: Binary Blasterz『ロボット 弾幕』
name_original: Binary Blasterz『ロボット 弾幕』
description:
Playing in Fullscreen mode is highly recommended.

Binary Blasterz『ロボット 弾幕』 is a rhythm bullet hell game in space. You can only move to the beat every 10₂ seconds. Survive the bullet onslaught until the cavalry arrives and saves the day.

Controls:
Left Click - Move to the location in range
CTRL - Display the your ships' hitboxes.
